::FireStrike::
FireStrike stopped walking towards Megatron on these words.  No 
amtter how great a warrior he was, that fusion cannon did it's 
job. "I respect your wishes" deciding to leave of master to show his 
disaproval. The shots hit him in the side again forcing him to step 
back. Small hole smoked then began to leak Mech-fluid, "But" he 
growled, "i want whatever is rest of this tin can."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Megatron leapt out of the way of the rocket. "Come now my dear
> Firestrike. I apreaciate your servitude as the next leader. You are
> hardly a Junkyard dog, I see much potential in you, to even take my
> place at some time, and you are a soldier, who deserves to rule." He
> then turned his voice to a more serious tone. "But this is a fight I
> must take, by myself. Do not interfere." On his last sentence, 
Megatron
> added an edge to his voice, to prove how serious he was.
> 
> He then turned to Unitron, "You however, have no future out of 
being my
> personal throne."
